籤詩版本二:
Pakarepo tsamba yakabhururuka mudenga, uye igwa rakazara nepfuma kubva kuGomo reTai rakadzoka.
Ukabvunza nezverwendo, chichava chinhu chakanaka, mberi kwako kuchine vanhu vanokudzwa vanokukurudzira.
詩意:
Iyi hexagram inomiririra kubudirira kwemukurumbira uye hupfumi.
Zvose zvinofamba zvakanaka.
解曰:
Ukabvunza nezvembiri. Pane munhu anokudzwa pamberi pako. Kuwedzera mufaro. Pfuma yakawanda.
Zvose zvinofamba zvakanaka nechiratidzo ichi. Ngazvifambe zvakanaka.
籤詩故事一:
◇Wei Pei Yu Xian (Wei Pei Yu Xian)
Wei Pei, nyanzvi murombo, angangoita makore makumi mana. Ndichiri kutungamirira dhongi kuyambuka Luoyang Bridge, mumwe mubati wehove pabhiriji akanga ava kuda kuuraya kamba huru kuti atengese. Wei Pei akatadza kuiona. Asi akanga asina mari, saka akachinja dhongi nekamba ndokuriregedzera pasi pebhiriji. Kubva ipapo, Wei Pei akapasa bvunzo dzehumambo uye akakwidziridzwa kusvika pachinzvimbo chepamusoro.
(Nyaya iyi inoshandisa pfungwa yehunyanzvi yekuti "kamba hombe yakasangana naWei Pei ikanunurwa" kutsanangura lottery iyi. Wei Pei akave nehunyanzvi nekuda kweizvi, nekuti akasangana ne"kamba hombe" iyi.)
聖意: Kana imba iri pamberi pako, iwe uchave nerombo rakanaka, uye uchakwanisa kutsvaga hupfumi, rombo rakanaka, bhizinesi, uye nyaya dzekuroora.
古人: Wei Pei Yu Xian (Wei Pei Yu Xian)
